languages.text: This attack deals weapon damage and is not counted towards attack limit, but can only be used once per round.

languages.text: Эта атака наносит урон, равный урону лазерного оружия, и не входит в лимит {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}атак на ход{/g}. Она может использоваться только 1 раз за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
languages.original_text: This attack deals damage of the las weapon and does not count towards the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g}, but can only be used once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Эта атака наносит урон лазерным оружием и не входит в лимит {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}атак на ход{/g}. Может использоваться только 1 раз за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
Эта атака наносит урон лазерным оружием и не входит в лимит {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}атак на ход{/g}. Может использоваться только 1 раз за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
Эта атака наносит урон, равный урону лазерного оружия, и не входит в лимит {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}атак на ход{/g}. Она может использоваться только 1 раз за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

languages.text: この攻撃はレーザー武器と同じダメージを与え、{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}攻撃制限{/g}には含まれないが、{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}ごとに1回しか使用できない。
languages.original_text: This attack deals the same damage as the las weapon and does not count towards the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g} but can only be used once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: この攻撃はレーザー武器と同じダメージを与え、{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}攻撃制限{/g}には含まれないが、{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}ごとに1回しか使用できない。

languages.text: Cette attaque inflige la même quantité de dégâts que l'arme laser et n'est pas déduite du {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}nombre maximum d'attaques par tour{/g}, mais elle n'est disponible qu'une fois par {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: This attack deals the same damage as the las weapon and does not count towards the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g} but can only be used once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cette attaque inflige la même quantité de dégâts que l'arme laser et n'est pas déduite du {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}nombre maximum d'attaques par tour{/g}, mais elle n'est disponible qu'une fois par {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: Este ataque inflige el mismo daño que el arma láser y no cuenta para el {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}límite de ataques por turno{/g}, pero solo puede efectuarse una vez por {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
languages.original_text: This attack deals the same damage as the las weapon and does not count towards the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g} but can only be used once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Este ataque inflige el mismo daño que el arma láser y no cuenta para el {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}límite de ataques por turno{/g}, pero solo puede efectuarse una vez por {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

languages.text: 此次攻击造成的伤害与激光武器的伤害相同，且不计入每回合{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}攻击次数{/g}上限，但每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中只能使用一次。
languages.original_text: This attack deals the same damage as the las weapon and does not count towards the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g} but can only be used once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 此次攻击造成的伤害与激光武器的伤害相同，且不计入每回合{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}攻击次数{/g}上限，但每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中只能使用一次。

languages.text: Dieser Angriff verursacht denselben Schaden wie die Laser-Waffe. Sie fließt nicht in das {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}Angriffslimit pro Zug{/g} ein, kann aber nur einmal pro {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} eingesetzt werden.
languages.original_text: This attack deals the same damage as the las weapon and does not count towards the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g} but can only be used once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Dieser Angriff verursacht denselben Schaden wie die Laser-Waffe. Sie fließt nicht in das {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}Angriffslimit pro Zug{/g} ein, kann aber nur einmal pro {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} eingesetzt werden.

languages.text: Bu saldırı, lazer silahı ile aynı hasarı verir ve {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}tur başına saldırı{/g} sınırından sayılmaz ancak her {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} yalnızca bir kez kullanılabilir.
languages.original_text: This attack deals the same damage as the las weapon and does not count towards the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g} but can only be used once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Bu saldırı, lazer silahı ile aynı hasarı verir ve {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}tur başına saldırı{/g} sınırından sayılmaz ancak her {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} yalnızca bir kez kullanılabilir.
